Bar Charts

Source: R/jjbarstats2.h.R
jjbarstats2.Rd

'Wrapper Function for ggstatsplot::ggbarstats and ggstatsplot::grouped_ggbarstats to generate Bar Charts.'

jjbarstats2(
  data,
  dep,
  group,
  grvar,
  direction = "independent",
  excl = TRUE,
  originaltheme = FALSE
)

Arguments

data

The data as a data frame.

dep

.

group

.

grvar

.

direction

select measurement type (repeated or independent)

excl

.

originaltheme

.

Value

A results object containing:

results$texta preformatted
results$todoa html
results$plotan image
results$plot2an image
